name: Not In Vain
description:
This is a guitar hero-like game, it's super clunky because i had not enough time to polish, if you miss 10 blocks you lose.

I have been playing with gamemaker studio 2 for 2-3 months and i tried to put all my adquired knowledge on this project.

Ps.:If you don't reconize because of my begginer pixel art, it's based on the sacrifice of Dyson in Terminator 2.

Enjoy!!
